title: High Diabetes Prevalence
description: In 2021, 30.8% of Pakistan's population aged 20 to 79 was affected by diabetes, marking one of the highest prevalence rates globally.

title: Significant Debt Service Burden
description: In 2023, Pakistan's debt service, including PPG and IMF, accounted for 37% of its exports of goods, services, and primary income, indicating a heavy financial obligation.

title: Low Import Unit Value Index
description: The import unit value index for Pakistan stood at 67.1 in 2023, suggesting relatively low import costs compared to the base year of 2015.

title: Minimal Use of Insecticide-Treated Bed Nets
description: In 2018, only 0.4% of Pakistan's under-5 population used insecticide-treated bed nets, highlighting a significant gap in malaria prevention efforts.

title: Negative Net Financial Flows
description: In 2023, Pakistan experienced a net financial outflow of $301.2 million in RDB concessional funds, reflecting a financial deficit in this area.

title: Quality of Insolvency Infrastructure
description: By 2024, Pakistan scored 3.33 in the B-READY Business Insolvency Pillar 2, indicating room for improvement in its judicial insolvency proceedings infrastructure.
